original_title: Celebrating Laughter: The Life and Films of Colin Higgins
overview: The story of a shy Australian boy who came to America as a teenager and rose to the pinnacle of success in Hollywood as a comedy screenwriter/director, showcasing how the Vietnam War era of 60s and 70s and the rise of the Gay Rights movement transformed Colin Higgins' life and sense of purpose.
title: Celebrating Laughter: The Life and Films of Colin Higgins
